v3.1.5 release notes

  • Release date: 2013-10-27
  • Downloads

What's New

  • Form validation: Fixed for attribute, ariaLive and clearing errors
  • Session timeout: Improved usability of timeout message and fixed numeours bugs
  • Tabbed interface: Fixed mobile tab creation
  • Lightbox: Fixed bugs that prevented WAI-ARIA enhancement and POST actions
  • i18n: Updated strings
  • Removed all -eng and -fra files except for the ones in the root and the demos folder root

Details

Number of commits: 63

  • @pjackson28: 42 commits
  • @nschonni: 9 commits
  • @EricDunsworth: 54 commits
  • @LaurentGoderre: 3 commits
  • @jeresiv: 2 commits
  • @chyne: 1 commit
  • @sgdowney: 1 commit

List of commits

  • Updated build version to v3.1.5-development. - Paul Jackson, 2013-09-17 12:31:44 -0400
  • Charts: Cleaned up the known issue description. - Paul Jackson, 2013-09-17 14:46:26 -0400
  • Session timeout: Added missing ajaxLimiter variable. - Paul Jackson, 2013-09-18 15:47:08 -0400
  • Update sessiontimeout.js - Christopher Hyne, 2013-09-18 18:05:42 -0400
  • Grids: Removed default text shadow for th elements. - Paul Jackson, 2013-09-19 12:04:54 -0400
  • Slideout: Added missing space in toggle link. - Paul Jackson, 2013-09-20 12:38:06 -0400
  • Slideout: Converted space from v3.0 to i18n interword space. - Paul Jackson, 2013-09-20 12:44:26 -0400
  • Slideout: Fixed JSHint issue. - Paul Jackson, 2013-09-20 12:59:26 -0400
  • i18n: Added missing i18n mappings for full-stop, list-comma-space and interword-space. - Paul Jackson, 2013-09-20 15:15:54 -0400
  • Form Validation: "for" attribute only on labels - Nick Schonning, 2013-09-23 21:05:36 -0400
  • Fixed spacing/tabbing issues in certain plugins' source code. Prevents building from modifying these source files. - Eric Dunsworth, 2013-10-02 22:16:29 -0400
  • i18n: Updated strings - Paul Jackson, 2013-10-07 16:11:18 -0400
  • i18n: Updated plugins to use new i18n strings with key commands - Paul Jackson, 2013-10-07 16:49:52 -0400
  • Fixed broken links to Twitter Bootstrap and CLF2 theme's FIP images. - Eric Dunsworth, 2013-10-07 21:49:01 -0400
  • i18n: Removed a few unused i18n items (v3.1) - pjackson28, 2013-10-08 02:37:48 -0400
  • Tabbed Interface: fix mobile tab creation - Pat Heard, 2013-10-08 22:57:43 -0400
  • Grids SCSS: Adjusted module-news-article's padding/margin properties. Prevents a "double" top spacing effect when images aren't used. - Eric Dunsworth, 2013-10-15 11:20:21 -0400
  • Slide out tab SCSS: Redeclared display block placeholder selector in IE7-8. Prevents details/summary elements from being treated as inline by IE7-8. The :not pseudo-selector's presence in the standard SCSS file causes the entire placeholder selector's outputted rule to be ignored by those browsers. - Eric Dunsworth, 2013-10-15 16:22:18 -0400
  • Session: Remove double activation time on page load. - sgdowney, 2013-10-16 11:05:54 -0400
  • Grids demos/SCSS: Added support for, and examples of external mailto: links. - Eric Dunsworth, 2013-10-21 21:05:42 -0400
  • Added link to 4.0 working examples - Jeremy S, 2013-10-23 12:19:15 -0400
  • Examples: Add v4.0 working example links - Jeremy S, 2013-10-23 12:53:08 -0400
  • Form validation: Fixed ariaLive and clearing errors (fixes #3074) - Paul Jackson, 2013-10-25 12:06:38 -0400
  • Fixed merge conflicts - Paul Jackson, 2013-10-25 13:08:00 -0400
  • Session: usability improvements to timeout message (#3190) - Pat Heard, 2013-10-25 13:32:09 -0400
  • Fix #3186 - Laurent Goderre, 2013-10-26 19:35:29 -0400
  • Removed all -eng and -fra files except for the ones in the root and the demos folder root - pjackson28, 2013-10-26 23:44:13 -0400
